channel.title: ♫All You Want♫
channel.description:
Heeeeeey i have my own broadcast of music!!!!!!
I'm playing 24/7 all genre's! if you register you can chat and request any music i will play them always after the song i play currently
How to start
1.Go to http://grooveshark.com/ register an account 2.When you done all that go to this link http://grooveshark.com/#!/eyemusics/broadcast 3.Well now enjoy the music and you can chat and request your own music!
Thats how easy it is! or you just can click on this link http://grooveshark.com/#!/eyemusics/broadcast and dont need to register and enjoy the music!!!!!!!!! ALL GENRE'S All Day Long
My Goals
1. I wanna become popular 2. I wanna meet new people that are friendly! :) 3. I'm enjoying the music myself if you like it i like it! :)
Rules of the chat!!!
1. Do Not Spam 2. Dont say bad words like Fuck you, You are a dick same as u mom and like that stuff ^^ 3. u must enjoy it haha xD
